User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account in the application.

name.description: The full name of the user.

role.description: The user's job title or role within the company.

department.description: The department the user belongs to.

avatar.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

permissions.description: A list of permissions granted to the user.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project within the company.

department.description: The department responsible for the project.

description.description: A detailed description of the project.

progress.description: The completion percentage of the project.

status.description: The current status of the project.

startDate.description: The start date of the project.

endDate.description: The projected end date of the project.

members.description: List of user IDs who are members of the project.

budget.description: The total budget allocated for the project.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a single task within a project or assigned to a user.

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

assignedTo.description: The ID of the user this task is assigned to.

assignedBy.description: The ID of the user who assigned the task.

projectId.description: The ID of the project this task belongs to.

dueDate.description: The due date for the task.

status.description: The current status of the task.

priority.description: The priority level of the task.

duration.description: Duration of the meeting in minutes.

participants.description: List of user IDs participating in the meeting.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a chat channel.

userId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

content.description: The text content of the message.

channelId.description: The ID of the channel (e.g., 'general', 'marketing', or a direct message channel ID).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for all users.

/projects/{projectId}/tasks/{taskId}.description: Sub-collection for tasks within a specific project.

/meetings/{meetingId}.description: Stores details for all scheduled meetings.

/chat/{channelId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores all chat messages, organized by channel.
